text: Baciye	bakurikira	muvyo	amashetani	yababwira	kuntwaro	ya cami y’umwami	Sulaimanu	(iii)	nawe akaba	atahakanye	Imana	yiwe	y’ukuri, ahubwo amashetani niyo yahakanye Imana yabo y’ukuri mukwigisha abantu uburozi,	kandi	ubwo	burozi	bwamanukanywe	n’Abamarayika	babiri	aribo Haruta na Maruta mu gisagara ca Babil, kandi ntibigishije uwariwe wese kugeza aho bamubwira bati:- mu vy’ukuri twebwe ni nk’ikibazo, mugabo ntuhakane	Imana	yawe y’ukuri, baca	biga	kuribo	muvyo	bashoboye	mu gutandukanya umuntu n’umukenyezi wiwe, kandi ntibari mu bantu bagira inabi	canke	mubadafise akamaro	kuribo, mu	vy’ukuri	barafise	ubumenyi bw’uko uwatoye ibi vyose atazoronka ahantu ahariho hose mw’ijuru, kandi ntankeka ni bibi cane muvyatumye bagurisha imitima yabo nkiyo babimenya
